verses.roman:
tasyā āvedayat prāptaṁ
śaśaṁsa yadu-nandanam
uktaṁ ca satya-vacanam
ātmopanayanaṁ prati

synonyms: tasyāḥ—to her; āvedayat—he announced; prāptam—as having arrived; śaśaṁsa—he related; yadu-nandanam—Kṛṣṇa, the child of the Yadus; uktam—what He had said; ca—and; satya—of assurance; vacanam—words; ātma—with her; upanayanam—His marriage; prati—concerning.
translation: The brāhmaṇa announced to her the arrival of Lord Yadunandana and relayed the Lord's promise to marry her.
